title: On the definition of the nucleon axial charge density
authors: J. Yu. Panteleeva, E. Epelbaum, J. Gegelia, U.-G. Mei{\ss}ner
abstract:
We work out the spatial density distributions corresponding to the
axial-vector charge density operator for spin-1/2 systems using states
described by sharply localized wave packets in arbitrary Lorentz-frames. The
static approximation, leading to the frequently assumed Breit-frame
distributions, is also considered. We discuss the interpretation of the
resulting spatial densities in terms of the axial charge density.
